item.description:
Lets attend the first ever Mini-Games Convention put on by the Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup. Bring your favorite games, snacks and drinks. No alcohol or smoking is allowed.

Time: 9:00 AM - 11:00 PM

Cost: Free admission Coffee should be provided but there is also a store to either side of us that may have better coffee.

Food: Pizza/Sub shop across the street and next door.

Host: Corey Johnson
http://boardgames.mee...

Directions: It is in the basement of a day care center which has a direct
entrance in the back of the building near the play area.

Route 102 in Hudson next to the Hudson Stop. If you are coming
from the East, we are approximately one quarter of a mile past
the Mobil on the Run station, and we are on the right hand side
just before White Hen Pantry. If you are you coming from the
West, we are on the left hand side in the parking lot
immediately after White Hen Pantry.

The basement is on the cool side, so dress accordingly.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Hudson Mini-Games Convention
